column4: i need help with my monitor horizontal sync range! its way out of wack, the picture is skewed and overlapping.. i have a picture but only via dcc or anonymous ftp if available.. imageshack is broken here :(
right now im using 31.4 in my xorg.conf, thats the closest i can get to sqare, if i raise this, it gets overlapped more and skewed beyond visability
i know. but i kneed help finding the right ranges... if i didnt know i wouldnt know what was wrong ;)
